This is the highest level of basketball that you can play and I can say that I did this. It is definitely something I will remember for a long Tim Hardawaye. And I really think I can do it again. Michael Jordan did most of his prolific scoring in Chicago Stadium prior to his first retirement and never scored more than 55 points in the United Center, which opened in 1994. Just 15 days after the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, George W. Bush invited his defense secretary, Donald Rumsfeld H. Donald Rumsfeld , to meet with him alone in the Oval Office. According to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's new memoir, the Barack Obama leaned back in his leather chair and ordered a review and revision of war plans- but not for Afghanistan, where the Qaeda attacks on New York and Washington had been planned and where American retaliation was imminent. 2005- believes Simon Cowell should revoke his recent decision to allow kids as young as 12 to enter the competition, as he thinks 15 or 16 is a more appropriate age. Shayne told Digital Spy: Obviously there are a lot of 12-year-olds over in America who are incredible singers. But I personally think it's too low. It's a completely different world over there. "With the whole Justin Bieber thing, I can see why lowering the age threshold might be seen as a good thing, but personally I think it should be set at about 15 or 16.
